sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Settings, AlertTriangle, Car, Heart, Users, Shield, Zap, Play, Pause, RefreshCw } from 'lucide-react'; const ControlPanel = ({ currentScenario, setCurrentScenario, manualOverride, setManualOverride }) => { const [isSimulationRunning, setIsSimulationRunning] = useState(true); const scenarios = [ { id: 'normal', label: 'Normal', description: 'Standard traffic flow', icon: Car, color: 'text-success-600' }, { id: 'heavy', label: 'Heavy', description: 'Rush hour traffic', icon: Users, color: 'text-warning-600' }, { id: 'accident', label: 'Accident', description: 'Emergency incident', icon: AlertTriangle, color: 'text-danger-600' }, { id: 'ambulance', label: 'Ambulance', description: 'Emergency vehicle priority', icon: Heart, color: 'text-danger-600' } ]; return (
{/* Control Panel Header */}

Control Panel

System Management

SECURE
{/* Simulation Controls */}

SIMULATION CONTROL

{/* Manual Override */}

MANUAL OVERRIDE

AI MODE MANUAL
{manualOverride && (
Manual override active
)}
{/* Scenario Selection */}

TRAFFIC SCENARIOS

{scenarios.map((scenario) => { const Icon = scenario.icon; const isActive = currentScenario === scenario.id; return ( ); })}
{/* System Metrics */}

SYSTEM METRICS

AI Confidence
94%
Response Time
0.3s
Active Sensors
48/50
Uptime
127h
); }; export default ControlPanel;
